SqlString.String: SELECT S.SHOP_ID,U.NAME AS SHOP_NAME,S.SHOP_AREA,GG.MIN_SERIES_NUMS, GG.MAX_SERIES_NUMS,SE.SERIESID FROM MBFS_AGENT_DETAIL_SHOP S LEFT OUTER JOIN MBFS_AGENT_DETAIL D ON (S.MBFS_AGENT_DETAIL_ID= D.ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN MBFS_AGENT A ON (D.MBFS_AGENT_ID = A.ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS_UNIT U ON S.SHOP_ID= U.UNIT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN MBFS_SUBJECT_AREA GG ON (1 = 1 AND (NVL(S.SHOP_AREA, 0) >= NVL(GG.MIN_AREA, 0)) AND (NVL(S.SHOP_AREA, 0) < NVL(GG.MAX_AREA, 0))) LEFT OUTER JOIN MBFS_SUBJECT_SERIES SE ON (GG.MBFS_SUBJECT_ID = SE.MBFS_SUBJECT_ID AND SE.IS_USE='T') WHERE A.AGENT_ID= @UNIT_ID AND D.AGENT_ID = @AGENT_ID AND GG.MBFS_SUBJECT_ID = @MBFS_SUBJECT_ID;

SELECT A.PROD_PROP || A.PROD_SORT || A.PROD_STYLE AS PROD_CLS_ID,A.NAME,A.PROD_THEME, A.PROD_SORTS,A.ORIENTATION,A.ON_SALE_DATE,A.ON_BRAND_PRC,A.PLAN_BATCH,A.PROD_GROUP, A.PROD_CLASS FROM MBFS_SUBJECT_SERIES S INNER JOIN PROD_CLS A ON (S.SERIESID = A.PROD_CLASS) WHERE A.PROD_YEAR= @PROD_YEAR AND S.MBFS_SUBJECT_ID = @MBFS_SUBJECT_ID AND @Where;
SELECT P.STYLE_CODE,P.COLOR_CODE,I.STYLE_IMAGE FROM MBFS_PRODUCT P INNER JOIN MBFS_PRODUCT_IMAGE I ON P.ID = I.MBFS_PRODUCT_ID WHERE P.STYLE_CODE = @STYLE_CODE ;
SELECT U.FUTURE_RATE FROM ISSUE_UNIT U WHERE EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM ISSUE_SUBJECT WHERE BRAND = U.BRAND_ID AND ID = @ISSUE_SUBJECT_ID) AND U.AGENT_ID = @UNIT_ID;

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM (SELECT G.UNIT_ID AS SHOP_ID,G.PROD_ID, G.MIN_COUNT, G.MAX_COUNT, G.MUST_CHANGED, '2' AS DOC_TYPE, LAST_MODIFIED_DATE FROM MBFS_PRI_RESTRICT_DETAIL G INNER JOIN MBFS_PRI_RESTRICT R ON R.ID = G.MBFS_PRI_RESTRICT_ID WHERE R.MBFS_SUBJECT_ID = @MBFS_SUBJECT_ID AND G.UNIT_ID = @UNIT_ID AND R.DOC_STATE = '1' AND G.UNIT_TYPE='02' UNION SELECT S.SHOP_ID,G.PROD_ID, G.MIN_COUNT, G.MAX_COUNT, G.MUST_CHANGED, '1' AS DOC_TYPE, R.LAST_MODIFIED_DATE FROM MBFS_PRI_RESTRICT_DETAIL G INNER JOIN MBFS_PRI_RESTRICT R ON R.ID = G.MBFS_PRI_RESTRICT_ID INNER JOIN MBFS_AGENT_DETAIL D ON G.UNIT_ID = D.AGENT_ID INNER JOIN MBFS_AGENT A ON D.MBFS_AGENT_ID = A.ID AND A.IS_START='1' INNER JOIN MBFS_AGENT_DETAIL_SHOP S ON D.ID = S.MBFS_AGENT_DETAIL_ID AND S.IS_START = '1' WHERE R.MBFS_SUBJECT_ID = @MBFS_SUBJECT_ID1 AND G.UNIT_ID = @UNIT_ID1 AND R.DOC_STATE = '1' AND G.UNIT_TYPE ='01' UNION SELECT 'A00030' AS SHOP_ID,G.PROD_ID, G.MIN_COUNT, G.MAX_COUNT, G.MUST_CHANGED, '0' AS DOC_TYPE, LAST_MODIFIED_DATE FROM MBFS_GEN_RESTRICT_PRODUCT G INNER JOIN MBFS_GEN_RESTRICT R ON R.ID = G.MBFS_GEN_RESTRICT_ID WHERE R.MBFS_SUBJECT_ID = @MBFS_SUBJECT_ID2 AND R.DOC_STATE = '1' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM MBFS_GEN_RESTRICT_UNIT WHERE MBFS_GEN_RESTRICT_ID = R.ID AND UNIT_ID = @UNIT_ID2)) ORDER BY DOC_TYPE DESC, LAST_MODIFIED_DATE DESC, PROD_ID ) TT WHERE TT.SHOP_ID = @SHOP_ID AND PROD_ID = @PROD_ID

SELECT * FROM (SELECT G.UNIT_ID AS SHOP_ID,G.PROD_ID, G.MIN_COUNT, G.MAX_COUNT, G.MUST_CHANGED, '2' AS DOC_TYPE, LAST_MODIFIED_DATE FROM MBFS_PRI_RESTRICT_DETAIL G INNER JOIN MBFS_PRI_RESTRICT R ON R.ID = G.MBFS_PRI_RESTRICT_ID WHERE R.MBFS_SUBJECT_ID = @MBFS_SUBJECT_ID AND G.UNIT_ID = @UNIT_ID AND R.DOC_STATE = '1' AND G.UNIT_TYPE='02' ) TT WHERE TT.SHOP_ID = @SHOP_ID AND TT.PROD_ID = @ABC;

SELECT M.SHOP_ID, S.NAME AS SHOP_NAME, G.* FROM MBFS_AGENT_DETAIL_SHOP M INNER JOIN MBFS_AGENT_DETAIL F ON (M.MBFS_AGENT_DETAIL_ID= F.ID) INNER JOIN MBFS_AGENT MB ON (F.MBFS_AGENT_ID = MB.ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS_UNIT S ON M.SHOP_ID = S.UNIT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT S.PROD_CLS_ID, S.PROD_PROP, S.PROD_SORT, S.PROD_STYLE, S.COLOR, S.EDITION, C.NAME AS NAME, D.DESCRIPTION COLOR_DESC, E.DESCRIPTION EDTN_DESC, C.PROD_THEME, C.PROD_SORTS, C.ORIENTATION, C.ON_SALE_DATE, C.ON_BRAND_PRC, C.PLAN_BATCH, C.PROD_GROUP, C.PROD_CLASS FROM (SELECT DISTINCT SUBSTR(B.PROD_ID, 1, 8) AS PROD_CLS_ID, B.PROD_PROP, B.PROD_SORT, B.PROD_STYLE, B.COLOR, B.EDITION
FROM PRODUCT B) S LEFT OUTER JOIN PROD_CLS C ON (S.PROD_PROP = C.PROD_PROP AND S.PROD_SORT = C.PROD_SORT AND S.PROD_STYLE = C.PROD_STYLE) LEFT OUTER JOIN COLOR D ON (S.COLOR = D.COLOR) LEFT OUTER JOIN PROD_EDTN E ON (S.PROD_PROP = E.PROD_PROP AND S.EDITION = E.EDITION)) G ON (1 = 1) WHERE F.AGENT_ID = @AGENT_ID AND MB.AGENT_ID = @AGENT_ID1 AND @WHERE ORDER BY M.SHOP_ID,G.PROD_CLS_ID;
